org.trellisldp.namespaces

Class NamespacesJsonContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trellisldp.namespaces.NamespacesJsonContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamespaceService

    public class NamespacesJsonContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements NamespaceService
    Create a namespace service based on reading/writing the namespaces to a central JSON file.
